__e: Therefore, I begin to suspect that white people did not act as they did because they were white, but for some other reason.
I have a hunch all of you could tell us something about it.
Don't go there, Miguel. You start thinking LaGuerta's onto you, you'll decide to do very bad things to another innocent person, and I can't let that happen.
When he suspects somethin', you usually get it.
It's one thing to suspect what your secret was.
Well, we have to make sure he doesn't suspect anything.
Don't go there, Miguel. You start thinking LaGuerta's onto you, you'll decide to do very bad things to another innocent person, and I can't let that happen.
I have a hunch all of you could tell us something about it.
Look... You may not know where she is, but you've got a pretty good idea who's got her.
I know he suspects me, and yet he treats me well.
Not enough to cause suspicion, just enough to do the job.
That probably means somebody is on to her, but who? I don't know.
I'd like to invoke my right not to incriminate myself.

I met him after. After being questioned by me, you befriend another even more obvious suspect than yourself. And then you manage to get him to incriminate himself, all the while hoping he'll fuck you.
He'd suspected you and the others for some time.
I don't understand. Why didn't you come straight out with it and show me this, if you suspected me?
I have to say, sister, that I always distrusted his appearance of goodness.
